modName: THEHAGs Privat Wartattoos - Facial Warpaints for Females
summary:
With RaceMenu Overlays - Plugin!!! Choose your Tattoo and color in game.
Mit RaceMenu Overlays - Plugin!!! Wähle dein Tattoo und dessen Farbe im Spiel.

More than 7 facial tattoos for females
Mehr als 7 Gesichtstattoos für Frauen

For RaceMenu Overlays or simply Facetextures
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/41210-1-1377727390.jpg[/IMG]

________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]Guys be warned, i´m a german guy and sorry for my poor english. And Show me your Pictures (non-nude, this Page is open to the public), har har har ^^[/B][/color]
________________________________________________________________________________________
[/CENTER]



[color=#0099FF][B]MODIFIKATION 1
________________________________________________________________________________________
BS-THEHAGs PRIVAT WARTATTOOS FOR RACEMENU OVERLAYS (Main-File)[/B][/color]



[CENTER][IMG]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/41210-1-1377732124.gif[/IMG]
[/CENTER]


BS-THEHAGs Privat Wartattoos for Racemenu Overlays allows you to put my Tattoos at game in the Racemenu for Vanilla/UNP/CBBE Females. You can change Color whichever you want and selecet Tattoos to your face. Its great to Combine with my other Mod:

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30404/]THEHAGs PRIVAT TATTOOS FOR CBBE 3.2[/URL] (ADULT CONTENT)

or

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28740/]THEHAGs PRIVAT TATTOOS FOR UNP - UNPB[/URL] (ADULT CONTENT)

[color=#FFFF00][B]REQUIRED MOD[/B][/color]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624]RaceMenu by Expired[/URL]

[color=#FFFF00][B]INSTALLATION[/B][/color]

1. Follow, for Installation, the DESCRIPTON on RaceMenu-Page!!!
You Need RaceManu v2-0-2 File or greater, Overlays Plugin and SKSE 1.6.13/14/15/16. It´s easy to install, all but SKSE, you find on this Page great Videos (english/german) for install SKSE.

2. Download BS-THEHAGs Privat Wartattoo Plugin - File with NMM and install at last.

Now you can add Tattoos in game. Start game, command "showracemenu" at console, select Facetexture(Makeup) category, select Default and press "T" to choose your tattoo, adjust Color with with "E". Look at the Plugin-sreenshots 1 & 2.

[color=#FFFF00][B]IMPORTANT!!![/color]
You NEED a SKSE.ini-File for a correct quality/high resulotion. Look at the section "High-Resolution Warpaint" on the RaceMenu-Page! It is allways necessery or you get blocky Tattoos.
If you dont have this SKSE.ini you can download my File in the Downloadsection.
You not sure you have it? Download my SKSE.ini-File, BUT do not overwrite something. cancel it when its going to overwrite, well, you have it already!
You have this .ini? Open it in Skyrim/Data/SKSE/SKSE.ini and add command like this:
[color=#FFFF00][Display]
iTintTextureResolution=2048[/B][/color]
________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]KNOWN ISSUES[/B][/color]

-You are getting the error message "invalid race menu script detected" OR nothing showing up in your racemenu tap? Go to the RaceMenu Mod page and download optional file "Loose Main Scripts v2-0-5" or "Loose Base Scripts v2-1-1".

-Makeup are blocky? Download this one:
Better Makeup for SKSE by Diethardt: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31665

-vanilla warpaints are blocky/low quality? That is a normal and a side effect of the hight Resolution.
you have two options: Use Paints/Tattoos in 2048 like my Tattoos or SkyrimKnight Warpaints (look RECOMMENDED) or leave this Mod and Keep on the vanilla stuff. Maybe there is a Mod to fix the vanilla warpaints in a higher resolution, take a look on Nexus.
________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]RECOMMENDED[/B][/color]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40831//?]Warpaints by SkyrimKnight [/URL]
For more warpaints and mix up download this Awesome one, too.
_______________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]CREDITS[/B][/color]

[color=#FFFF00][B]Big thanks to [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5379258/?]BladeSinger06[/URL] to convert my tatts to Racemenu-plugin, [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/815393/?]TheBasti82[/URL] for updating the Plugin. And dont forget Expired from RaceMenu-Mod to endorse his great Mod. [/B][/color]
________________________________________________________________________________________





[color=#0099FF][B]MODIFIKATION 2
_______________________________________________________________________________________
THEHAGs PRIVAT WARTATTOOS FOR UNP Body 1.6 or CBBEv3.2 (all OPTIONAL-FILES are Facetexture-Files,NO RACEMENU)[/B][/color]


[CENTER][IMG]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/41210-1-1377727488.gif[/IMG]
[/CENTER]


This Facetexture replace the femalehead.dds.
Adds Tattoostyles on face. It works only on human females without Khajits and Argonier! Use it with my other Tattoo-Mods for UNP/CBBE and look at the description.

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30404/]THEHAGs PRIVAT TATTOOS FOR CBBE 3.2[/URL] and [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28740/]THEHAGs PRIVAT TATTOOS FOR UNP - UNPB[/URL] ( ADULT CONTENT )

_____________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]It´s important you download and install the orginal CBBEv3.2 Mod by Caliente or the orginal UNP Mod+DIMface by Dinom99 at first!!! And give her/him a big ENDORSE, this work is realy awesome!
And maybe you give me your endorsement if you like my Tattoos and other users find this Mod easier.[/B][/color]

_____________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]REQUIRED MOD[/B][/color]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CALIENTES FEMALE BODY MOD BIG BOTTOM EDITION[/URL] (ADULT CONTENT)

or

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/URL] (ADULT CONTENT)


[color=#FFFF00][B]INSTALLATION[/B][/color]

-Download and extract with RAR anywhere you want
-Chose one Femalehead.dds-file
-Open folder skyrim/data/textures/actors/character/female and copy+paste my file in that folder.
-Done

OR (RECOMMENDED USAGE/MANUELL)

-for only your character use a costom race. find folder where the bodytexture is
and copy a file in that folder and allow to overwrite. Make sure costom race use orginal CBBE.3.2/UNP (1.5-1.6). OR download manually the UNP female Body+Facetex or CBBE Body (incl. facetex) and copy all these files ( femalehead.dds, feamalebody_1.dds, femalehands.dds.... ) in Folder where the body- and headtextures of your costom race is, overwrite all. And at last copy my file in that foder of your CR, too. it can be that your look of your CR looks a Little bit different as normal.

Mostly you can find that folder in:
skyrim/data/textures/"NAME OF YOUR COSTOM RACE"/actors/character/female

Costom Races are, for example:

Temptress Race by Psychos1s and Brokefoot: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717 (My Favorite)
Lunari Race by bhaktisean: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602/
The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX..: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474//
Epic Elves race by zzjay: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20172/
...and there are so mutch more on Nexus

-also you can use all Bodytextures with Unique Bodies - WIP by Rain The Windflower for all separate vanilla races. It is a bit complicated to install, it´s for advanced mod-users (Manual install only). Dont ask me, please read the discription of that mod. If you use Unique Race Skins by ShadowGamer19, it is a awsome mod, but it has no effect on faces (if i wrong, disabusing me please).
________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]RECOMMENDED[/B][/color]

Unique Bodies - WIP by Rain The Windflower
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5968/

Custom Races Utility - by MurdermiesteR
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28806/

Custom Races - by d_rail
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8720
_____________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#FFFF00][B]Thanks and credits goes to Caliente and Dimon99 for that awesome Bodymods!!! And the Nexus-crew! Bethesda for sure, but thay have my Money.[/B][/color]
author: THEHAG and BladeSinger06
